languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Whenever wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Opening{/g} with Charge, Slice, Macabre Dance, they apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g} 10 {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the target.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用英勇冲锋、快刀一闪或死亡轮舞{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，此次攻击都会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用英勇冲锋、快刀一闪或死亡轮舞{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，此次攻击都会对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。

languages.text: 着用者が 突撃、スラッシュ、死の舞踏の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたびに、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を負わせる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が突撃、一閃、死の舞踏の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するたびに、ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を負わせる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} con las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Carga, Tajo o Danza macabra, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) al objetivo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g} con las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} Carga, Tajo o Danza macabra, inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10) al objetivo.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} mit der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Sturmangriff, Schlitzen oder Totentanz erzielt, fügt er dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10) zu.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Öffnung{/g} mit einer der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Sturmangriff, Schneiden oder Totentanz landet, kann er dem Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10) zufügen.

languages.text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} Рывок, Рассечение или Пляска смерти, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} Рывок, Рассечение или Пляска смерти, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).

Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностями{/g} Рывок, Рассечение или Пляска смерти, персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10).

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} avec les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Charge, Lacérer ou Danse macabre, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) à la cible.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} avec les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} Charge, Trancher ou Danse Macabre, il inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10) à la cible.
